  x[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter the value:"))

while(n!=1){

n=length(x)

}
count


x=c(2,5,6,7,4,1,2,3,6,5,8,9)
n=length(x)
max=0
for(i in 1:(n-1)){
 if(x[i]>x[i+1]){
 max=x[i]
 }else{
 max=x[i+1]
 }
}
max
